description: Schema for storing current user context.

language.description: The current language active for the user.

region.description: The current region active for the user.

jurisdiction.description: The current jurisdiction active for the user.

currency.description: The currency the user is browsing the site in.

browser_cookie_id.description: The value of the current browser_cookie_id.

num_products_in_cart.description: Current number of products in cart.

net_price_cart.description: The total net price of the cart.

net_profit_cart.description: The total net profit of the cart.

num_recipes_in_cart.description: Current number of recipes in the cart.
